tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geothermal_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_due_date DATE,
    maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pipelines (
    pipeline_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pipeline_name VARCHAR(255),
    pipeline_length DECIMAL,
    pipeline_diameter DECIMAL,
    pipeline_material VARCHAR(50),
    pipeline_capacity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE pumps (
    pump_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    pump_name VARCHAR(255),
    pump_type VARCHAR(50),
    pump_capacity DECIMAL,
    pump_status VARCHAR(20),
    pump_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE pipelines ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    length DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, 
    diameter DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE pumps ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    power DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, 
    efficiency DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE assets ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
    installation_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE pipelines (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    length DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    diameter DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE pumps (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    capacity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    technician VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
